name: Adesso Xtream H3B  Headphones
Features: [Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless Technology: Offers up to 30' feet of Wireless freedom, plus the benefits of lower battery consumption, faster pairing and higher security encryption., Rotatable DJ Pivot Headphones: Features Rotating, 180-degree DJ pivot mechanism so you can keep one ear on your music and the other on external sounds., Built-in Rechargable Battery with iOS Battery Indicator: Easily charge your device with its built-in rechargeable battery and refer to the iOS battery indicator on your Bluetooth enabled device to show you in real-time how much battery life is available to prevent exhausted battery life., Built-in Microphone: Omni-directional Microphone allows you to make Â­flawless hands-free phone calls., Dual Mode Audio Input: You can feed audio to your headset via Bluetooth from any Bluetooth enabled device or plug in the 3.5" audio jack which then allows you to use many kinds of media devices., Connection: Bluetooth 3.0+EDR, Bluetooth Protocols: A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFP, Microphone Type: Omnidirectional, Playing Time: Up to 10 hours, Stand By Time: Up to 800 hours, Charge Time: 4 hours, 370 mA Rechargeable Ploymer Battery, Power Input: 5V]
